template.name: integral file
template.comment: Integral file = ./methylamine.aoints.0 Record size in doubles = 65536 No. of integs per rec = 43688 Max. records in memory = 2 Max. records in file = 26331 No. of bits per label = 8 No. of bits per value = 64
template.record: \s*Record size in doubles = {I,n:recordsize}\s*No\. of integs per rec =\s*{I,n:integsperrec}\s*
\s* Max. records in memory =\s*{I,n:maxinmem}\s*Max\. records in file =\s{I,n:maxrec}
\s*No. of bits per label =\s*{I,n:bitslabel}\s*No\. of bits per value =\s*{I,n:bitsperval}
